title: Skinner
description:
Skin Scanner is an application based on artificial intelligence technologies and the medical experience of dermatologists.  It helps to identify skin cancer, 6 types of acne and more than 50 other skin diseases. With our application, you can analyze the condition of the skin for signs of disease in just 1 minute.

Assess and track the risks of skin problems that concern you: various types of rashes, birthmarks, acne. Check your moles for oncology, analyze neoplasms and papillomas. Using our application on a regular basis, you will be able to contact your doctor in time and avoid morbidities.

With the Skin Scanner you can:
- Make a daily screening of your skin.
- Track the dynamics of your test results and monitor your skin health in the long term. 

It’s easy to use:
- Take a clear photo of your skin area from a distance of 5-10 cm
- Wait a minute while AI analyzes the photo
- That’s it! You get a result!
- Save results and track dynamics

It is important that Skin Scanner does not replace or cancel a visit to a dermatologist, it does not diagnose or prescribe treatment. The application is just your mobile assistant for the skin self-control. We recommend that you contact your doctor immediately if you feel unwell or see a spot or mole on your skin start to change, itch, or bleed.

summary: Skinner - personal skin scanner on your phone. Analyze areas of your skin!
